data.title: Erica Who??
data.text:
Quote pjones2005:

Quote happi:

Quote pjones2005: If after 11 times.....the longest is three years ~) ~) She needs to quit!!! :D :D

she stayed with jeff for 3 years wow!! out of all her marraiges, i liked when she was with mike roy, but he died

of course!!

Hmmmmmmmmmm…you would think that either she makes really bad choices, or she is “unliveable with”…it can’t be all the mens fault…wake up Erica…your looks (& size 1)won’t last forever…but if she ends up with Jeff, at least she has made full circle!!!

Quote pjones2005:

Quote happi:

Quote pjones2005: I am gonna let Rob on for a few.......if I miss you here, I'll see ya' in the morning.......blessings, Pj........well, there goes tonights TV.....here comes the Shrub, *) opps *) I mean Bush........thank goodness for cable!!!

be nice some of us are repulicans ok, well good night my friend… as always have a wonderful night and sleep good… will talk in the morning… i’m going to stay on a little longer…

I am being nice…I just personally feel that we need a President who knows what it is like to live like “real” people…do I pay bills, or buy groceries…health care ?) ?) It is hard to be realistic when you make 250,000 a year( plus a guaranteed retirement plan) vs 45,000…I respect the man, & his job, but I think he does not know what most of us go through day to day…but, on the other hand, I am very proud to live in a place where we can agree to disagree with the government, and not be shot!!! I like being able to talk to you…it is cool to have a friend to share opinions with…have a great evening, friends, Petra

Quote happi:

Quote pjones2005:

Quote happi:

Quote pjones2005: I am gonna let Rob on for a few.......if I miss you here, I'll see ya' in the morning.......blessings, Pj........well, there goes tonights TV.....here comes the Shrub, *) opps *) I mean Bush........thank goodness for cable!!!

be nice some of us are repulicans ok, well good night my friend… as always have a wonderful night and sleep good… will talk in the morning… i’m going to stay on a little longer…

I am being nice…I just personally feel that we need a President who knows what it is like to live like “real” people…do I pay bills, or buy groceries…health care ?) ?) It is hard to be realistic when you make 250,000 a year( plus a guaranteed retirement plan) vs 45,000…I respect the man, & his job, but I think he does not know what most of us go through day to day…but, on the other hand, I am very proud to live in a place where we can agree to disagree with the government, and not be shot!!! I like being able to talk to you…it is cool to have a friend to share opinions with…have a great evening, friends, Petra

i know you were being nice, i was just messing with you…i think we know each other well enough to feel free to say something…don’t you agree??? i mean what it’s been years that we been friends (feels like it)

Quote happi:

Quote pjones2005: :) There is no minority.....we are all entitled to our own feelings......great to have friends we can discuss things with...and not have to be phoney......I really "love" all you guys.........you make me smile....(almost as much as my Zach dreams *) *) *) )

true we can have different views on being repulican and some people being that other party… but still be friends

i know if we weren’t friends you would get mad at me for saying that… like i told you before my brother thinks i’m wrong for being a repulican, heck he thinks it’s wrong because i’m a vegaterain… can’t please everyone…
